Class.name: cAdmin.WebSocket
Class.Description: Web socket class. Manages all comunication with the client.

Parameter.name: Timeout
Parameter.Description: How long to wait for user when connection established

Parameter.name: AuthorizationTimeout
Parameter.Description: How long to wait for authorization key when connection established

Parameter.name: Resource
Parameter.Description: Resource name, required to access this websocket

Method.name: Server
Method.Description:
Main method.
Authenticates user, checks that he has required resource. If all goes well, initialises sensors and forwards users' input to Choose Action

Method.name: RequireAuthorization
Method.Implementation: set authPair = ..Read(,.status,..#AuthorizationTimeout) // wait for package set st = '$$$OK set obj = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set st = ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonProvider).%ConvertJSONToObject(authPair,,.obj,1) quit:$$$ISERR(st) st set loginStatus = ##class(%SYSTEM.Security).Login(obj.User,obj.Password) // login user quit loginStatus

Method.name: RequireResource
Method.Description: Checks, if User (as defined in RequireAuthorization method) has required resourse

Method.name: InitSensors
ChooseAction
Method.Description:
Chooses what action to take, based on user input.
Expected input:
<action>
<action>:<argument1,argument2,...,argumentN>

Method.name: Sensors
Method.Description:
Sends client a JSON encoded readings of sensors
sensorslist - comma separated list of sensors
Sends all sensors data if list is an empty string
Example: CPU,LockTable,CSPGatewayLatency

Method.name: DBStats
Method.Description: Writes Database information in JSON format

Method.name: Cconsole
Method.Description:
Outputs Cconsole entries in JSON format.
action - action to perform. May be one of:
cconsole-fulltextsearch, cconsole-filterdate, cconsole-alert.
params, depending on methods are:
‘Term1’ ,’Term2’,...'TermN' - for cconsole-fulltextsearch
yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss.fff,YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.FFF - for cconsole-filterdate
Empty string for cconsole-alert.
Descriptions of methods are in documentation for cAdmin.data.CconsoleLog class

Method.name: Process
Method.Description:
Various actions with processes.
action - List, Kill, Suspend or Resume
id - Id of a process to Kill, Suspend or Resume.

Method.name: DevTools
Method.Description:
Various developement tools
args - loop or RandomNumber or Increment

Method.name: TestLoop
Method.Description: Returns random cconsole.log entry every 10 seconds

Method.name: WriteString
Method.Implementation: set buffer = 8192 if $length(data)>=buffer { set parts = ($length(data) \ buffer) + 1 do ..Write("{""parts"" : """_parts_"""}") hang 1 } do ..Write(data)

Method.name: ArrayToJSON
Method.Description:
Write out the contents of the local array pData as String using JSON notation pMetaData is a $List containing the names of the properties of the objects in the order in which they will appear.
pData is an array containing the data. Each node in the array should be a $List containing values for properties. This should match the meta data provided in pMetaData. The array of data can use any subscript value its wants. It is possible to define a hierarchical array. In this case, children nodes are placed within a parent collection called children.
